attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The PM job is like a CEO job of a company. If a CEO of a company ran it into the ground the way Blair is running England into ruin, they would be fired.
Everything he and his government does is oppressing the citizens more and more with ever increasing ways of taxing us. As we pay his salary I say we should fire him.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
